publications.title: Characterization of CRB1 splicing in retinal organoids derived from a patient with adult-onset rod-cone dystrophy caused by the c.1892A>G and c.2548G>A variants

donor.disease_description: Adult-onset rod-cone dystrophy caused by compound heterozygous mutations in CRB1 (c.1892A>G and c.2548G>A)

genomic_modifications.description: Compound heterozygous CRB1 mutations: c.1892A>G (p.Tyr631Cys) and c.2548G>A (p.Gly850Ser)

genomic_characterisation.summary: Mutations in CRB1 confirmed by Sanger sequencing; no karyotype data reported.

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Western Australia Human Research Ethics Committee
Sir Charles Gairdner Hospital Human Research Ethics Committee
